example.parse: (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC سلبيت) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN مواطنين)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العالم)))))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ازاء) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN لاانسانية)) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)))))) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تلطخ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)))))
